name: Methin' Time
description:
"It's Methin' Time..." - Walter White

Mething Time is an incremental game where you can build up your very own meth empire and become the next Heisenberg.

I literally just started working on this game. There's basically nothing lmfao

-----[Changelog]-----

v0.1

- Basically just published the game lol. That's it.

v0.2

- Added dynamic mouse camera

- Added Enrichment GUI (still WIP)

- Fixed a few UI bugs

Note: The grey oblong on the left is the storage. The three on the right are the actual meth-making machines. I'm currently working on the Enrichment machine, the top one.
